0 000 100 01101 000000

5 101 000 0 000000001011011
1 001 000 1 00000000001
3 011 000 1 00000000101
7 111 100 00110
6 110 100 00110
5 101 100 01100
2 010 100 01111
2 010 100 01111 0000000

SUM
SUM 2 PKTS      => 110 000 1 00000000010        3
LITERAL 1       => 110 100 00001
LITERAL 2       => 010 100 00010

PRODUCT
PROD PKTSIZE 22 => 000 001 0 000000000010110    54
LITERAL 6       => 101 100 00110
LITERAL 9       => 011 100 01001 0000

MINIMUM
MIN PKTSIZE 33  => 100 010 0 000000000100001    7
LITERAL 7       => 101 100 00111
LITERAL 8       => 110 100 01000
LITERAL 9       => 000 100 01001 0

MAXIMUM
MAX 3 PKTS      => 110 011 1 00000000011        9
LITERAL 7       => 000 100 00111
LITERAL 8       => 101 100 01000
LITERAL 9       => 000 100 01001 00000

LESS THAN
LESS PKTSIZE 22 => 110 110 0 000000000010110    1
LITERAL 5       => 101 100 00101
LITERAL 15      => 010 100 01111 0000

GREATER THAN
GREATER 2 PKTS  => 111 101 1 00000000010        0
LITERAL 5       => 111 100 00101
LITERAL 15      => 101 100 01111

EQUAL TO
EQUAL PKTSIZE 22=> 100 111 0 000000000010110    0
LITERAL 5       => 101 100 00101
LITERAL 15      => 111 100 01111 0000

MIX
EQUAL PKTSIZE 80=> 100 111 0 000000001010000    1
SUM 2 PKTS      => 010 000 1 00000000010        4
LITERAL 1       => 010 100 00001
LITERAL 3       => 100 100 00011
PROD 2 PKTS     => 110 001 1 00000000010        4
LITERAL 2       => 000 100 00010
LITERAL 2       => 010 100 00010 00
